org.xbmc.eventclient

Class PacketHELO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbmc.eventclient.Packet
      • org.xbmc.eventclient.PacketHELO

  • public class PacketHELO
extends Packet
    XBMC Event Client Class A HELO packet establishes a valid connection to XBMC. It is the first packet that should be sent.
    Author:
    Stefan Agner

      • PacketHELO

        public PacketHELO(java.lang.String devicename)
        A HELO packet establishes a valid connection to XBMC.

      • PacketHELO

        public PacketHELO(java.lang.String devicename,
          byte iconType,
          byte[] iconData)
        A HELO packet establishes a valid connection to XBMC.
        Parameters:
        devicename - Name of the device which connects to XBMC
        iconType - Type of the icon (Packet.ICON_PNG, Packet.ICON_JPEG or Packet.ICON_GIF)
        iconData - The icon as a Byte-Array
